name: LazyVR
description:
Re-make of my 2016 VR micro game; now using SteamVR systems.

Please join the Discord server for details and other LazyVR project stuff.

https://discord.gg/wjYJUsE

Downloading, and even donations DO NOT guarantee continued development and support.
